Package gw.plugin.document

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DocumentConfigUtil
    Provides access to the current server configuration information.
    IDocumentContentSource
    BillingCenter-specific extension to the base IDocumentSource interface.
    IDocumentContentSourceBase
    Interface to a DocumentManagementSystem. Used to add, update and retrieve the contents of documents.
    IDocumentCreationOptions  
    IDocumentMetadataSourceBase
    Interface description...
    IDocumentProductionBase
    An interface to a Document Production system. This interface will be used to create documents both synchronously and asynchronously, and both as a direct result of user action and from rules (or other Gosu). Synchronous creation means that the document contents are generated immediately and returned to the calling method for further processing. In this scenario, the caller is responsible for persisting the document to the DMS system (if desired). Asynchronous creation means that the document contents may not be generated for some time, or may require extra workflow processing and/or manual intervention. The contents of the document are not returned, although a URL or other information allowing the checking of state may be, and the IDocumentProduction implementation is responsible for adding the document to the DMS system and notifying the Guidewire software upon successful completion of the document.
    IDocumentTemplateDescriptor
    The IDocumentTemplateDescriptor interface defines the API which must be implemented by an object which represents a document template descriptor. A document template descriptor, in turn, corresponds to an actual document template (Word MailMerge template, PDF form, etc) and contains five different kinds of information:

    Metadata about the template itself (id, name, effective dates, etc) Metadata defaults which should be applied to documents created from the template (status, etc) The set of values which are referenced by the values to be inserted into the document template, known as "Context Objects". This includes both default values and a set of legal alternative values for use in the document creation UI. The set of field names and values to be inserted into the document template, including some formatting information. The locale in which the document will be generated in

    IDocumentTemplateSerializer
    Serializes and deserializes document template descriptors. Typically, descriptors persist as XML, as such implementations of this class understand the format of document template descriptors and can read and write them as XML.
    IDocumentTemplateSource
    An interface fronting access to template documents e.g., for generating letters or forms. An implementation may simply store templates in a local repository, or, a more sophisticated implementation might interface with a remote document management system.
    IPDFMergeHandler
    Interface implemented by classes which implement code to perform merges on PDF templates on the server.
